column9: Sometimes You just need security. You are alone, in a new city. You don't know what to eat. Maybe new food? Some local speciality? Or something familiar, well known? I took a big order of King fries. That was exactly what I needed.

This is a normal Burger King with the typical food it provides.  Good for a quick hamburger, fries and drink.  Menu meals are good value.  The place could be a bit cleaner but always good for a fast meal.
It's Burger King and you know what you get. The location close to the train station is very convenient for travelers.
The level of food and décor used to be appallingly bad here but had been lifted to an average level.  The service is still slow, unfortunately.  Expect long lines around lunch especially.

column7: Open late, nothing else to say!
column9:
It's open late and opposite the railway station! Not much more to say, service was fast when I went although it was also very quiet.

Staff were accommodating when I wanted my burger customised!

column7: Clean, fast service and good execution
column9: For once, the BK-franchise delivers and during my only visit, I was surprised by the right elements of the BK brand being displayed.  Unsure if it is as good at all times - consistency at BK is a well-known  problem

The people in there were rude, mostly youngsters with little money and students overworked. I only ate the burger because nothing else was open at that time and I was hungry. Otherwise, I advice you to avoid it
